DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is assess the severity of osteoarthritic knee between one-leg and both-leg standing radiograph in primary OA knee
DOC.brief_title: One-Leg Standing Radiograph: A Novel Technique to Evaluate the Severity of OA Knee
DOC.detailed_description: All patients were performed digital radiographs which one-leg and both-leg standing anteroposterior view. Medial and lateral joint space width were measured. The severity of OA knee was identified by the Kellgren-Lawrence (KL) classification.
DOC.criteria: Bilateral knee pain more than 3 months Inflammatory OA knee previous knee injury previous knee infection previous knee surgery pregnant women unable to bear weight on one leg
